typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		country as string,
		indicator as string,
		date as string,
		year_week as string,
		value as string,
		source as string,
		url as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> HospitalData
HospitalData split(ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	disjoint: true) ~> ConditionalSplit1@(DailyHospitalSurveillance, DailyHospitalWebsite)
